articles.description: Patricia Earl, the Queen's head housekeeper at Sandringham in Norfolk, was "embarrassed" after some servants refused to form a four-week bubble that would allow the monarch and Prince Philip to spend Christmas at the estate, it is claimed
articles.content:
The Queen's head housekeeper at Sandringham has quit after staff allegedly revolted over Christmas bubble plans and left the monarch "furious", it is reported.
A source close to Buckingham Palace in… [+4393 chars]
